Imagery Description: (a) Youthful winged male figure, holding caduceus in 1. hand and bird in outstretched r., facing seated draped woman with box on lap and mirror in r., (a) Eros seated on Ionic capital, holding phiale in 1. hand and spray in r. Bowl of lid: female heads to r., with beaded sphendonai. 'Flowers' emerging from scrolls, springing out from base of fan below handles. From same tomb as the lebes gamikos 40987 (no. 99).
